message: The SDG_TARGET field for indicator 1-1-3, translated into en
data: Target 1.1: By 2020, eliminate extreme poverty for all, everywhere, using a poverty line with income per capita less than US$1.25 in purchasing power parity (PPP) price 2005)/day; by 2030, reduce by at least half the poverty rate according to the country's multidimensional poverty criteria (Global Goal 1.1 and Target 1.2)
